DOC.brief_summary: This study design measure effect evogliptin bone metabolism healthy volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal healthy woman ( least 5 year ) BMI 18~30 kg/m2 Presence history hypersensitivity allergic reaction drug Clinically relevant abnormal medical history present disease Presence history drug abuse Participation clinical trial within 2 month dose . Bood donation 2 month apheresis 1 month study . Use prescription medicine , herbal medicine within 2 week overthecounter medication vitamin substance within 1 week dose . Use drug affect bone metabolism sex hormone receptor related medicine , calcitonin parathyroid hormone related medicine , systemic corticosteroid , bisphosphate , etc . Smoking 10 cigarettes/days within 3 month first dose . Use alcohol 21 units/weeks Subject judge eligible study participation investigator .
